property.name: dfs.namenode.name.dir
property.description: Path on the local filesystem where the NameNode stores the namespace and transaction logs persistently.

property.name: dfs.datanode.data.dir
property.description: Comma-separated list of paths on the local filesystem of a DataNode where it stores its blocks.

property.name: dfs.replication
property.description: Default block replication. The actual number of replications can be specified when the file is created.

property.name: dfs.permissions.enabled
property.description: If "true", enable permission checking in HDFS. If "false", permission checking is turned off, but all other behavior is unchanged.
